entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 12:55 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
